name: Bug Catcher
description:
Bug catcher is made for the Game Off 2021 game jam. This years theme was "Bug".

The game is about a bug catcher helping the game developer out by catching and removing bugs from their game. Whenever a bug is caught it will result in a gameplay bug being fixed.

Added the option to use touch controls so the game can be played on mobile too.

The code for the game can be viewed at: Github page. Feel free to look around the code and load it up in Godot v3.3.3.

Edit 30/11/2021 17:45 CET: Added a new final level based on feedback in the Game Off discord.
